column2: I refer to the observation made by the Court of Appeal

column1: Budhapriya Weerasingha and others Vs. V.B.R.K. Weerasingha and others1

column2: “When termination is unjustified, the contract of service must be treated as
unbroken and the Petitioners must be deemed to have been in service
without any break. The Court of Appeal confirmed the fact of unjustified
continued in service till 2011 unless some of them retired prior to 2011.”
